name: Web Runner
description:
This project has been created to collect data for my disertation on In game microtransactions. If you choose to play this game with data collection the game will record your play time, Longest distance, number of purchased jumps, player currency and player balance and the amount of time ads are skipped or stoped completely. 

This game has a real world currency tracker but in game purchases and the tracker do not use real money they are used to track a fake amount that would be spent on in game purchases. Please play this game as if the balance is real world currency.

Credits

Programming - Danny Pym-Hember

Music - Action Chiptunes by Subspace audio https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

Data Collection - Microsoft Azure Playfab https://playfab.com/

Fonts

Blade Runner Movie Font by Phil Steinschneider https://www.dafont.com/blade-runner-movie-font.font

Quantum Font by Brian Kent https://www.dafont.com/quantum.font

If you could also fill out this survey on in game purchases and microtransactions.

Survey: https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/PSDGM5M
